name: The Roof (Back In Time)
content: I got you stuck off the realness
I got you stuck off the realness
It wasn't raining yet
Yet
But it was definitely
But it was definitely
A little misty on
That warm November night
And my heart was pounding
Pounding
My inner voice resounding
Begging me to turn away
But I just had to see your face
To feel alive
And I was twisted in the web
Of my desire for you
My apprehension blew away
I only wanted you
To taste my sadness
As you kissed me in the dark
I envision you caressing me
And go back in time back in time
To relive the splendor of you and I
On the rooftop that rainy night
And so we finished the MoÃ«t and
I started feeling liberated
You took me in your arms
I was so caught up in the moment
So I threw caution to the wind
For such a long long time
And for a while I forgot
The sorrow and the pain
And melted with you as we stood
There in the rain
I envision you caressing me
And go back in time back in time
To relive the splendor of you and I
You and I
On the rooftop that rainy night
Every time
I feel the need and every time
I envision you caressing me
And go back in time back in time
To relive the splendor of you and I you
On the rooftop that rainy night
Last night
Last night I dreamed that I
Whispered the words I love you
That I love you boy
And touched you so very touched
Subtly as we were kissing goodbye
Pretty baby
How I'm missing you
Every time I
I envision you caressing me

On the rooftop that rainy night
